actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE Orders SET 
	Notes = '{{ModifyOrderForm.data.OrderNotesInCopy}}',
	Address = '{{ModifyOrderForm.data.AddressInCopy}}',
	ContactName = '{{ModifyOrderForm.data.ContactNameInCopy}}',
	PhoneEmail = '{{ModifyOrderForm.data.ContactPhoneEmailInCopy}}',
	ShipmentID = '{{ModifyOrderForm.data.ShipmentIDCopy}}',
	OrderSize = '{{ModifyOrderForm.data.OrderSizeInCopy}}',
	Product1 = '{{ModifyOrderForm.data.Product1Copy}}',
    Price1 = '{{ModifyOrderForm.data.Price1Copy}}',
	Product2 = '{{ModifyOrderForm.data.Product2Copy}}', 
    Price2 = '{{ModifyOrderForm.data.Price2Copy}}', 
	Product3 = '{{ModifyOrderForm.data.Product3Copy}}', 
    Price3 = '{{ModifyOrderForm.data.Price3Copy}}', 
	Product4 = '{{ModifyOrderForm.data.Product4Copy}}', 
    Price4 = '{{ModifyOrderForm.data.Price4Copy}}', 
	Product5 = '{{ModifyOrderForm.data.Product5Copy}}', 
    Price5 = '{{ModifyOrderForm.data.Price5Copy}}' 
	WHERE Ordername = '{{ModifyOrderForm.data.OrderID}}'
